languages.text: "О шерин, светило десятка миров и миллиардов подданных! Пришли потолковать с Джай Хейдари о душевной сладости? Или вести речи с торговым представителем {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}?" {n}Джай держится непреклонно еще пару секунд, а затем разливается сладким смехом по мостику.{/n} "Ну как, {name}, подходит мне личина одной из самых могущественных людей в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "О шерин, светило десятка миров и миллиардов подданных! Пришли потолковать с Джай Хейдари о душевной сладости? Или вести речи с торговым представителем {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}?" {n}Джай держится непреклонно еще пару секунд, а затем разливается сладким смехом по мостику.{/n} "Ну как, {name}, подходит мне личина одного из самых могущественных людей в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе{/g}?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, {name}, does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} suit me?"

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的！噢，几十个世界与几十亿臣民的光辉太阳啊，你是想和婕伊·海达利谈谈她灵魂中的甜蜜吗？还是想与{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的贸易代表谈谈正事？”{n}婕伊脸上严肃的表情保持了几秒，随后发出了温柔的大笑声，笑声充满了整个舰桥。{/n}“好吧，{name}。我打算假装是整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最强大的人之一，这样的伪装适合我吗？”
languages.original_text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, {name}, does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} suit me?"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的！噢，几十个世界与几十亿臣民的光辉太阳啊，你是想和婕伊·海达利谈谈她灵魂中的甜蜜吗？还是想与{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的贸易代表谈谈正事？”{n}婕伊脸上严肃的表情保持了几秒，随后发出了温柔的大笑声，笑声充满了整个舰桥。{/n}“好吧，{name}。我打算假装是整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最强大的人之一，这样的伪装适合我吗？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the Imperium?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, , does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the Expanse suit me?"

languages.text: «¡Shereen! Oh, sol glorioso que ilumina cuantiosos mundos y billones de súbditos, ¿ha acudido a conversar con Jae Heydari sobre la dulzura de su alma? ¿O le gustaría hablar con un representante comercial del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?». {n}Jae mantiene su expresión firme y seria durante unos segundos antes de llenar el puente con su agradable risa.{/n} «Bueno, {name}, cree que me pega el disfraz de una de las personas más importantes de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, {name}, does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} suit me?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Shereen! Oh, sol glorioso que ilumina cuantiosos mundos y billones de súbditos, ¿ha acudido a conversar con Jae Heydari sobre la dulzura de su alma? ¿O le gustaría hablar con un representante comercial del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?». {n}Jae mantiene su expresión firme y seria durante unos segundos antes de llenar el puente con su agradable risa.{/n} «Bueno, {name}, cree que me pega el disfraz de una de las personas más importantes de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン！数十の世界と数十億の臣民を持つ栄光の太陽よ、ジェイ・ヘイダリの魂の甘さについて話をしに来たのかい？それとも、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の交易代表とお話になりたいのかい？」{n}ジェイおはしばらくの間、真剣な表情を崩さず、やがて穏やかな笑いをブリッジに響かせる。{/n}「さて、{name}、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}で最も権力ある人物の一人を装うのは、あたしらしいと思うかい？」
languages.original_text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, {name}, does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} suit me?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン！数十の世界と数十億の臣民を持つ栄光の太陽よ、ジェイ・ヘイダリの魂の甘さについて話をしに来たのかい？それとも、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の交易代表とお話になりたいのかい？」{n}ジェイおはしばらくの間、真剣な表情を崩さず、やがて穏やかな笑いをブリッジに響かせる。{/n}「さて、{name}、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}で最も権力ある人物の一人を装うのは、あたしらしいと思うかい？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen! O glorreiche Sonne von Dutzenden von Welten und Milliarden von Untertanen, seid Ihr gekommen, um mit Jae Heydari über ihre süße Seele zu sprechen? Oder möchtet Ihr mit einer Handelsvertreterin des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} sprechen?" {n}Jae bleibt einige Augenblicke lang unerschütterlich ernst, bevor sie die Brücke mit dem Klang ihres sanften Lachens erfüllt.{/n} "Nun, {name}, steht mir die Verkleidung als eine der mächtigsten Personen in der gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, {name}, does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} suit me?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen! O glorreiche Sonne von Dutzenden von Welten und Milliarden von Untertanen, seid Ihr gekommen, um mit Jae Heydari über ihre süße Seele zu sprechen? Oder möchtet Ihr mit einer Handelsvertreterin des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} sprechen?" {n}Jae bleibt einige Augenblicke lang unerschütterlich ernst, bevor sie die Brücke mit dem Klang ihres sanften Lachens erfüllt.{/n} "Nun, {name}, steht mir die Verkleidung als eine der mächtigsten Personen in der gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g}?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Shereen ! Ô glorieux soleil qui illuminez des dizaines de mondes et des milliards de sujets, êtes-vous là pour discuter avec Jae Heydari de la douceur de son âme ? Ou souhaitez-vous vous entretenir avec une représentante commerciale de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} ? » {n}Jae garde son sérieux pendant quelques instants, puis elle laisse son rire mélodieux emplir la passerelle.{/n} « Alors, {name}, comment me trouvez-vous sous le masque de l'une des personnes les plus puissantes des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, {name}, does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} suit me?"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen ! Ô glorieux soleil qui illuminez des dizaines de mondes et des milliards de sujets, êtes-vous là pour discuter avec Jae Heydari de la douceur de son âme ? Ou souhaitez-vous vous entretenir avec une représentante commerciale de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} ? » {n}Jae garde son sérieux pendant quelques instants, puis elle laisse son rire mélodieux emplir la passerelle.{/n} « Alors, {name}, comment me trouvez-vous sous le masque de l'une des personnes les plus puissantes des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g} ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim! Onlarca dünyası ile milyarlarca tebaasının görkemli güneşi, buraya Jae Heydari'yle ne kadar tatlı bir kişiliği olduğunu konuşmaya mı geldi? Yoksa {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} ticari temsilcisiyle mi konuşmak istiyorsun?" {n}Jae, önce kısa bir süre sabit ve ciddi kalıp ardından da yumuşak gülüşleriyle köprüye neşe saçıyor.{/n} "Ee {name}, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'in{/g} en güçlü insanlarından birinin kıyafeti bana yakışmış mı?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen! O glorious sun of dozens of worlds and billions of subjects, have you come to converse with Jae Heydari about the sweetness of her soul? Or do you wish to speak to a trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}?" {n}Jae remains staunchly serious for a few moments before filling the bridge with her gentle laughter.{/n} "Well, {name}, does the guise of one of the most powerful people in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} suit me?"

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim! Onlarca dünyasının ve milyarlarca tebaasının o görkemli güneşi, Jae Heydari'yle ne kadar tatlı bir kişiliği olduğu konusunda sohbet etmeye mi geldi? {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un bir ticari temsilcisiyle mi konuşmak istiyorsun yoksa?" {n}Jae önce kısa bir süre sabit ve ciddi kalıyor, ardından da köprüyü yumuşak gülüşleriyle dolduruyor.{/n} "Ee {name}, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'in en güçlü insanlarından birinin kıyafeti bana yakışmış mı?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
